code: import React,{Component}from'react';import Form from'./Form';import Contacts from'./Contacts';import shortId from'shortid';import Filter from'./Filter';import{jsx as _jsx}from"react/jsx-runtime";import{jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";class App extends Component{constructor(){super(...arguments);this.state={contacts:[],filter:'',name:'',number:''};this.onDeleteButtonClick=e=>{this.setState(_ref=>{let{contacts}=_ref;return{contacts:contacts.filter(contact=>contact.name!==e.target.value)};});};this.onFilterInputChange=e=>{this.setState({[e.target.name]:e.target.value});};this.onFormSubmit=(values,_ref2)=>{let{resetForm}=_ref2;console.log(values);for(let i=0;i<this.state.contacts.length;i++){if(values.name.toLowerCase()===this.state.contacts[i].name.toLowerCase()){alert('This contact has already been added');return;}}this.setState(_ref3=>{let{contacts}=_ref3;return{contacts:[...contacts,{id:shortId.generate(),name:values.name,number:values.number}]};});resetForm();};}componentDidMount(){if(JSON.parse(localStorage.getItem('contacts'))===null){localStorage.setItem('contacts',JSON.stringify([...this.state.contacts]));}else{this.setState({contacts:JSON.parse(localStorage.getItem('contacts'))});}}componentDidUpdate(prevProps,prevState){if(prevState.contacts!==this.state.contacts){localStorage.setItem('contacts',JSON.stringify([...this.state.contacts]));}}render(){const normalizedFiler=this.state.filter.toLowerCase();const filtered=this.state.contacts.filter(contact=>contact.name.toLowerCase().includes(normalizedFiler));return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{style:{height:'100vh',display:'flex',flexDirection:'column',justifyContent:'center',alignItems:'center',fontSize:40,color:'#010101'},children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Form,{onSubmit:this.onFormSubmit}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Filter,{contacts:this.state.contacts,onFilterInputChange:this.onFilterInputChange}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Contacts,{contacts:filtered,onDeleteButtonClick:this.onDeleteButtonClick})]});}}export default App;
